product.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
product.description: The ultimate smartphone experience with S Pen, advanced AI features, and professional-grade camera system.
overview: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra represents the pinnacle of smartphone innovation, combining cutting-edge technology with premium design. Featuring the revolutionary Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, this device delivers unparalleled performance for both everyday tasks and demanding applications.

The integrated S Pen takes productivity to new heights with improved latency and AI-powered features that make note-taking, drawing, and navigation more intuitive than ever. Whether you're a creative professional or a business user, the S25 Ultra adapts to your workflow seamlessly.

With its advanced camera system featuring a 200MP main sensor and multiple telephoto lenses, capture professional-quality photos and videos in any lighting condition. The AI-enhanced photography ensures every shot is optimized for stunning results.

features.title: S Pen Integration
features.description: Built-in S Pen with improved latency and new AI-powered features for enhanced productivity.

features.title: AI Photography
features.description: Advanced AI scene optimization and computational photography for stunning photos in any condition.

features.title: All-Day Battery
features.description: 5000mAh battery with intelligent power management and fast charging capabilities.

features.title: Premium Build
features.description: Titanium frame with Gorilla Glass Victus 3 protection and IP68 water resistance.

features.title: Galaxy AI Integration
features.description: Experience the power of on-device AI with features like Live Translate, Circle to Search, and AI Photo Editor.

features.title: S Pen Functionality
features.description: Precision control with 4,096 pressure levels, Air Actions, and improved 2.8ms latency.

features.title: Knox Security
features.description: Real-time malware protection and multi-layered security architecture with Samsung Knox.

features.title: 5G Connectivity
features.description: Support for both Sub-6GHz and mmWave with ultra-fast speeds and low latency.
